 2013-07152013-06-06,  ,  ,  CH, 
ActMuseums Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of ROBERT C. WILBAND of Mayne Island, British Columbia, to be a trustee of the Board of Trustees of the Canadian Museum of Civilization to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years, in the place of Ruth Ramsden-Wood.
AttachmentsAttachment
